subject: Track and Field
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The American sprinter Michael Rodgers ran a personal best to win the 60 meters, and Britain’s Mo Farah broke the European 5,000 record at the Birmingham Indoors in England.
snippet: The American sprinter Michael Rodgers ran a personal best to win the 60 meters, and Britain’s Mo Farah broke the European 5,000 record at the Birmingham Indoors in England.
